column5: Programme descriptionThe operation of financial markets and the delivery of financial services impact a variety of real-world issues including job creation and credit approval. Our vocationally minded MSc in Finance, Technology & Policy addresses the knowledge gap created by the pace of technological transformation in financial services and markets.Programme structureLearning will primarily be through:formal lecturesseminarsworkshopsflipped classespractical computer labs sessionsstudent presentationsguest speakersmasterclassesresearch assignmentsthe research dissertationAssessment methods include examinations, reports, essays and team presentations.
